title: Give me slogan ideas
for an online marketing campaign
prompt_suggestions.content: Give me slogan ideas: I'm launching an online marketing campaign for my new product. I need a catchy slogan.

title: Automate my Google Sheets workflow
with Zapier
prompt_suggestions.content: Automate my Google Sheets workflow with Zapier: I need to automate my Google Sheets workflow. I want to use Zapier to connect Google Sheets with other apps.

title: Give me feedback on my logo design
for a new startup
prompt_suggestions.content: Give me feedback on my logo design: I'm designing a logo for my new startup. I need feedback on the design.

title: Research our competitors
in the online education space
prompt_suggestions.content: Research our competitors: I need to research our competitors in the online education space. I want to know what they're doing and how we can do it better.
